name: Egyptian Murder Mystery
description: Horenheb, the General of the Pharaoh's army, and hero of the Egypt people is murdered. The prime suspect is his beloved fiance, Ankhesenamun. Ankhesenamun is forced to flee, and is on the run, from the Imperial authorities. Angered, sorrowful and revengeful, she is determined to find the killer. She will get her revenge, clear her name and bring justice once and for all.
